english.segment1: Stop. Take a minute take a breath, From the pressure that we need to know why, What makes you ali-i-i-ive
english.segment2: Why, Rely on ourselves. Putting God up on a shelf we depend, On what's left in our heads
english.segment3: It feels right and we believe, There won't be no sudden leave. But we keep running faster
english.segment4: Isn't it so nice to think, If we live in harmony. There'd be a happy ever after
english.segment5: (CHORUS). It doesn't matter if I. Had faith to move a mountain, Drink the Ocean Dry. Baby,I could never save myself. It Doesn't matter if I. Could reach into the deepest Corners of my mind. Baby, I could never save myself
english.segment6: Stop, Putting God in a box, Spend our time watching the clock While we wait. For a release that will take us away
english.segment7: Come down with a crash. Until we have another chance to go back. Is that gonna make it OK?
english.segment8: Hold your breath and you will see. In the end you'll have to breath, But we keep running faster
english.segment9: Fast. We forget reality. If you fall you're gonna bleed
english.segment10: There is no happy ever after
english.segment12: (BRIDGE). Falling out under sorrow. Glimpses of the past of what I used to think. and who I used to be. I'm realizing all that's real that I have in me
english.segment13: it doesn't matter. you better fight the laws of gravity. it doesn't matter. if i start it over
english.segment15: save myself. save myself. save myself. save myself
